login.title: Freelog Login
login.head: Login

validateErrors.iphone: The account format is incorrect，Please enter your mobile number
validateErrors.email: The account format is incorrect，Please enter your email address

errors: An exception has occurred. Please try again later!
Server internal exception, please try again later！
Application exception, please try again later！

resetPassword.title: Freelog Retrieve password
heads: Please fill in the mobile phone number/email address used during registration to receive the verification code. After successful verification, you can reset your password
resetPassword.nonExistentName: The user account does not exist
backToLoginTexts: Return to the login interface after {time}s;
resetPassword.defaultErrorMsg: An exception has occurred. Please try again later
resetPassword.serverError: Server internal exception, please try again later
resetPassword.appError: Application exception, please try again later

signup.title: Freelog registered user
signup.head: Registered freelog user
signup.emptyIphoneTip: The phone number cannot be empty
signup.emptyEmailTip: The email address cannot be empty
signup.usernamePlaceholder: Please enter a user username (1-30 letters, numbers and "-")
signup.passwordPlaceholder: Passwords must contain Numbers and letters; And is composed of 6-24 characters
signup.authCodeLengthRule: The length of the verification code is 6 characters
signup.defaultErrorMsg: An exception has occurred. Please try again later
signup.serverError: Server internal exception, please try again later
signup.appError: Application exception, please try again later

validateErrors.username: Username can only use lowercase letters, numbers, or dashes (-); must begin and end with a lowercase letter or number
